personalInfo.name: Tong Nguyen Quoc Anh
personalInfo.address: Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam
personalInfo.about: Proficient in system programming with expertise spanning Software Development and Cybersecurity, particularly in Application Security and Blue Team operations. Driven by a passion for low-level systems and core technologies.

education.school: HCMC University of Foreign Languages and Information Technology

experience.title: Senior Product Manager
responsibilities: Lead cross-functional team of 12 engineers and designers to deliver AI-powered analytics platform serving 50K+ users
Increased user engagement by 45% through data-driven feature prioritization and A/B testing methodology
Managed $2M product budget and coordinated with stakeholders across 5 departments
Established product roadmap resulting in 30% revenue growth year-over-year

experience.title: Product Manager
responsibilities: Launched 3 major product features that contributed to $5M in additional annual revenue
Conducted user research with 200+ customers to identify pain points and opportunities
Collaborated with engineering team to reduce product development cycle time by 25%
Created product specifications and user stories for agile development sprints

skills.items: Python, JavaScript, SQL, React, Node.js, Git

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform Redesign
projects.description: Led complete redesign of checkout flow resulting in 28% increase in conversion rate and $1.2M additional quarterly revenue. Implemented user testing with 150 participants and iterative design process.

projects.title: Machine Learning Recommendation System
projects.description: Developed collaborative filtering recommendation engine using Python and TensorFlow. Deployed to production serving 100K+ daily active users with 35% improvement in click-through rate.
